step_one.title: Explore the future of identity validation with Verifik
step_one.subtitle: Discover how Verifik is revolutionizing identity validation security.
step_one.header: We feature cutting-edge services including accurate and fast identification of identity documents using state-of-the-art OCR technology, as well as 3D biometric scans that ensure the authenticity of individuals and prevent impersonation.

cards.verify_id: Obtain and verify the information extracted

step_one.terms_label: To use this demo, you must accept our

step_two.drag_n_drop_title: Drag and drop the photo here
step_two.drag_n_drop_description: The ID Document file must have a .png .jpeg .jpg extension
step_two.upload_button: Find the file on your device

id_scanning.camera_not_found: A camera has not been found on the device or is momentarily disabled.
id_scanning.camera_not_found_description: Please make sure that the device on which you are performing the demonstration has a camera and that you have permissions to access it.
id_scanning.document_not_detected_description: Please make sure you are scanning an identity document such as an ID card, driver license or passport
id_scanning.failed_to_detect_limit: You have exhausted all attempts to perform the demo correctly
id_scanning.failed_to_detect_limit_description: You can repeat the demo as many times as you want but remember to follow the indications for it to be successful.
id_scanning.face_not_found_details: No face found in the ID document

liveness.center_yor_face: Center your face on the screen
liveness.center_your_face_subtitle: Please make sure your face is centered
liveness.get_closer_subtitle: Please come a bit closer for better face recognition.
liveness.liveness_error_message:
The liveness check has failed with the following error:
{{error}}
Do you want to try again?

form.title: Please fill this form to start with our demo

errors.Lead_exceeded_its_limit: Demo attempts has reached it's limit
errors.person_linked_to_another_email: Your biometrics are linked to another email
errors.person_linked_to_another_phone: Your biometrics are linked to another phone
errors.person_not_found: Biometrics did not match any record
errors.collection_not_set: Project is not configured properly. Collection not assigned yet
errors.person_already_set: Your registration has biometrics linked already
errors.Duplicated_person: Biometrics is being used into another record

add_biometrics.verifik_title: Unlock $10 in Credits with Your Biometrics!
add_biometrics.title: Validate your identity with biometrics
add_biometrics.verifik_content: Elevate your account's security to the next level! Register your biometric data now and enjoy seamless, ultra-secure access. Experience the convenience of cutting-edge security with a rewarding twist.
add_biometrics.content: After linking your biometrics, you could login with it for a faster and secure authentication

signup.title: Create an account
signup.project_flow_not_set: The project is not set yet
signup.project_flow_not_set_description: If you are the administrator, complete the steps in app.verifik.co
signup.verify_code_sent: Enter the 6-Digit verification code sent to {{destination}}
signup.error_expired_token: The token has been expired, go back and restart the process again

kyc_start_popup.title: KYC Verification
kyc_start_popup.content: To ensure the security and compliance of our services, we need to verify your identity. This quick and easy process ensures your safety and compliance with regulatory standards. Let's get started!

instructions_step.title: Verify your identity
instructions_step.header: To ensure the security and compliance of our services, we need to verify your identity. This quick and easy process ensures your safety and compliance with regulatory standards. Let's get started!
instructions_step.subtitle: Follow the steps to complete the verification
